column1: ** The Muster of Rohan takes place. The Rohirrim ride from Harrowdale.
** Faramir is rescued by Gandalf and Imrahil outside the gates of Minas Tirith. He meets Peregrin Took and reports to Denethor.

column1: ** An army of Orcs from the Morannon takes Cair Andros and passes into Anórien.
